metadata.Title: CVE-2020-19131 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - negligible.
metadata.Description:
Buffer Overflow in LibTiff v4.0.10 allows attackers to cause a denial of service via the "invertImage()" function in the component "tiffcrop".

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-19131` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.3.0-1
libtiff-tools - 4.3.0-1
libtiff5 - 4.3.0-1
libtiffxx5 - 4.3.0-1
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> reproducer causes an out-of-bounds read, so DoS only

criterions.comment: tiff package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.3.0-1').
